categories: Category:Imperial II-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Eviscerator, was an Imperial II-class Star Destroyer that served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.
The Eviscerator patrolled the Brentaal system shortly after the Battle of Endor. During the Battle of Brentaal IV the 181st Imperial Fighter Group was stationed aboard the Eviscerator.

After the fall of Brentaal IV, the Eviscerator was re-assigned to patrol in the Mirit, Pyria and Venjagga systems. In 6.5 ABY, the New Republic Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Liberator and Emancipator were used as a feint at Ord Mirit in order to lure the Eviscerator far from the Second Battle of Borleias.
